tuv.seg: Carer's Benefit is a payment made to insured people who leave the workforce to care for a person(s) in need of full-time care and attention
Íoctar Sochar Cúramóra le daoine le hárachas in Éirinn a fhágann an líon saothair chun aire a thabhairt do dhuine nó do dhaoine ar ghá cúram lánaimseartha a thabhairt dóibh
You can get Carer's Benefit for a total period of 104 weeks for each person being cared for
Féadfaidh tú Sochar Cúramóra do thréimhse 104 seachtain san iomlán i gcás gach duine a bhfuil tú ag déanamh cúram dó nó di
This may be claimed as a single continuous period or in any number of separate periods up to a total of 104 weeks
Is féidir é seo a éileamh mar thréimhse leanúnach amháin nó ina chodanna de thréimhsí éagsúla a bheidh 104 seachtain iontu san iomlán

However, if you claim Carer's Benefit for less than six consecutive weeks in any given period you must wait for a further six weeks before you can claim Carer's Benefit to care for the same person again

Má éilíonn tú Sochar Cúramóra i gcás tréimhse níos lú ná sé seachtaine leanúnacha i dtréimhse ar bith ní mór duit fanacht sé seachtaine eile sula n-éilíonn tú Sochar Cúramóra chun cúram a thabhairt don duine céanna arís
If you are caring for more than one person, you may receive payment for each care recipient for 104 weeks
Más rud é go bhfuil tú ag tabhairt cúram do bhreis agus duine amháin, féadfaidh tú íocaíocht a fháil ar feadh 104 seachtain i gcás gach duine acu
This may result in the care periods overlapping or running concurrently
Féadfaidh na tréimhsí cúraim forluí ar a chéile nó a bheith i gcomhthráth le chéile
The Carer's Support Grant is an annual payment made to carers by the Department of Social Protection
Is deontas airgid thirim é an Deontas Cúraim Faoisimh a íoctar le cúramóirí
It was formerly called the Respite Care Grant, but was renamed the Carer's Support Grant to better reflect how it is used by carers
Is féidir le cúramóirí an deontas a úsáid pé slí ar mian leo
It is paid on the first Thursday in June of each year
Bíonn na híocaíochtaí bhliantúla i leith cúraim faoisimh iníoctha ar an gcéad Déardaoin i Meitheamh gach bliain
Find out more about respite care
Léigh tuilleadh faoi chúram faoisimh anseo
Your right to carer's leave from employment complements the Carer's Benefit Scheme
Comhlánaíonn an ceart atá agat maidir le cearta cúramóra um shaoire ó fhostaíocht Scéim Sochar Cúramóra maidir le saoire
Carer's leave allows you to leave your employment temporarily for up to 104 weeks to provide full-time care for people in need of full-time care and attention

Tugann saoire cúramóra cead d'fhostaithe an fhostaíocht atá acu a fhágáil go sealadach ar feadh tréimhse nach mó ná 104 sheachtain chun cúram lánaimseartha a thabhairt do dhaoine a bhfuil gá acu le cúram agus aire lánaimsire
The leave is unpaid but people who take carer's leave have their jobs kept open for the duration of the leave
Ní íocfar iad le linn na saoire seo ach i gcás na ndaoine ar mhian leo saoire chúramóra a ghlacadh coinneofar a jabanna in áirithe dóibh ar feadh na saoire
You do not have to be eligible for Carer's Benefit to get carer's leave
Ní gá go mbeifeá i dteideal Sochar Cúramóra a fháil le bheith i dteideal saoire cúramóra a bheith agat
If you think you have been wrongly refused Carer's Benefit, or you are unhappy about a decision of a social welfare deciding officer about your entitlements, you can appeal this decision

Más dóigh leat gur diúltaíodh Sochar Chúramóra go héagórach duit nó mura bhfuil tú sásta le cinneadh a rinne Oifigeach Cinnidh Leasa Shóisialaigh faoi na teidlíochaí atá agat, tá sé de rogha agat achomharc a dhéanamh in aghaidh an chinnidh seo
You may be eligible for Carer's Benefit if:
D'fhéadfá a bheith i dteideal Sochar Cúramóra a fháil:
• You are aged 16 or over and under 66
• Má tá tú 16 bliana d'aois agus faoi bhun 66
• You have been employed for at least 8 weeks, whether consecutive or not, in the previous 26 week period
• Má bhí tú fostaithe ar feadh ocht seachtain i rith an 26 seachtain sular oibrigh tú mar chúramóir
You must be in employment for a minimum of 16 hours per week or 32 hours per fortnight
Ní mór duit 16 uaire oibre a bheith déanta agat in aghaidh na seachtaine nó 32 uaire in aghaidh na coicíse
You don't have to meet this condition if you were getting Carer's Benefit in the previous 26 weeks
Ní gá duit an choinníoll seo a chomhlíonadh má bhí Sochar Cúramóra á fháil agat i rith an 26 seachtain roimhe seo
• You give up work in order to be a full-time carer
• Má d'éirigh tú as obair le bheith i do chúramóir lánaimsire
Being a full-time carer means you must be living with or in a position to provide full-time care and attention to a person in need of care who is not living in an institution

Is éard is brí le bheith i do chúramóir lánaimsire ná a bheith i do chónaí le duine (nach bhfuil ag cur faoi nó fúithi in institiúid) a bhfuil cúram agus aire lánaimsire ag teastáil uaidh nó uaithi nó go bhfuil sé ar do chumas iad sin a thabhairt don té sin
• You are not living in a hospital, convalescent home or other similar institution
• Níl tú ag cur fút in ospidéal, i dteach téarnaimh nó in institiúid dá leithéid

However, you may continue to be regarded as providing full-time care and attention, if you or the person being cared for is having medical or other treatment in a hospital or other institution for a period not longer than 13 weeks
Áfach, má fhaigheann tú nó an duine a thugann tú aire dó/dí cóireáil leighis in ospidéil ar feadh 13 seachtain nó níos lú, glactar leat bheith ag tabhairt cúram agus aire lán aimseartha
• You meet the PRSI contribution conditions
• Ní mór duit coinníollacha Árachas Sóisialach Pá-Choibhneasa a shásamh
• The person being cared for is so incapacitated as to require full-time care and attention and is not normally living in an institution

• Ní mór don duine sin atá faoi do chúram agat a bheith chomh míchumasaithe sin go bhfuil cúram lánaimsire riachtanach dó nó di agus nach bhfuil an té sin ag cur faoi nó fúithi in institiúid. Ní mór teastas dochtúra a sholáthar
Medical certification is required unless the person being cared for is a child who is getting Domiciliary Care Allowance
Níl teastas dochtúra riachtanach má tá Liúntas Chúram sa Teaghais á íoc ag Limistéar de chuid Feidhmeannacht na Seirbhíse Sláinte i leith linbh
The carer of a child on a Domiciliary Care Allowance does not need to be the person who receives that allowance on the child's behalf
Ní gá gurbh é nó í an cúramóir an duine a fhaigheann an Liúntas Chúram sa Teaghais thar cheann an linbh
• You must not take part in employment, self-employment, training or education courses outside the home for more than 15 hours a week
• Ní féidir leat a bheith ag obair mar fhostaí nó féinfhostaithe ar feadh breis agus 15 n-uaire sa tseachtain
The maximum amount you can earn is €332.50 per week
Is é an t-uasmhéid gur féidir leat a thuilleamh in aghaidh na seachtaine ná €332.50

(€332.50 is your net income after you have deducted income tax and Universal Social Charge, PRSI, superannuation (pension payments), pension levy, union dues, subscriptions to Friendly Societies and any health insurance contract premium from your total wage.)

(Is é €332.50 do ghlanioncam tar éis duit do cháin ioncaim agus an Muirir Sóisialta Uilíoch, PRSI, aoisliúntas (íocaíochtaí pinsin), éileamh pinsin, costais cheardchumainn, an phréimh árachais sláinte agus do shíntiúis chuig Cumainn Chairdiúla ó d'íocaíocht iomláin.)
You must have at least 156 contributions paid at any time between your entry into insurance and the time you make your claim for Carer's Benefit and:
Ní mór duit 156 ranníocaíocht ar a laghad a bheith déanta agat ón am a chuaigh tú isteach sa scéim árachais go dtí an t-am a dhéanann tú an t-iarratas ar Shochar Chúramóra, agus
• 39 contributions paid in the Relevant Tax Year or
• 39 ranníocaíocht a bheith déanta agat sa Bhliain Chánach iomchuí, nó
• 39 contributions paid in the 12-month period before the start of Carer's Benefit or
• 39 ranníocaíocht déanta sa tréimhse 12 mí sular thosaigh an Sochar Cúramóra, nó
• 26 contributions paid in the Relevant Tax Year and 26 contributions paid in the year before that
• 26 ranníocaíocht déanta sa Bhliain Chánach Iomchuí agus 26 ranníocaíocht sa bhliain roimhe sin
Only contributions at Class A, B, C, D, H and E can be counted towards Carer's Benefit
Ní féidir ach amháin ranníocaíochtaí ag Aicme ÁSPC A, B, C, D, E agus H a chur san áireamh i dtreo Sochair Cúramóra
Class S (self-employed contributions) do not count
Ní chuirtear Aicme S (ranníocaíochtaí féinfhostaithe) san áireamh
The Relevant Tax Year is the second last complete tax year before the year in which you make your claim. So, for claims made in 2017, the Relevant Tax Year is 2015
Is í an dara bliain iomlán cánach deireanach roimh an mbliain ina ndéanann tú d'éileamh an Bhliain Chánach Iomchuí, mar shampla, is í 2013 an Bhliain Chánach Iomchuí i gcás éilimh a dhéantar i 2015
Periods of insurance in another EU member state may be taken into account to meet the PRSI contribution conditions
D'fhéadfaí tréimhsí árachais a críochnaíodh i mballstát eile de chuid an AE a chur san áireamh, chun na coinníollacha ranníocaíochta ÁSPC a chomhlíonadh
The last week of insurance must be paid in Ireland
Is gá gur íocadh an tseachtain dheireanach oibre d'árachas íoctha in Éirinn
You are awarded credited contributions or credits automatically when you are getting Carer's Benefit
Tabharfar íocaíochtaí curtha do shochar (creidmheasanna) duit gan iad a iarradh i gcás na tréimhse sin ina bhfuil tú ag fáil Sochar Cúramóra
Credits are awarded at the same rate as your last paid contribution
Tugtar creidmheasanna ar an ráta céanna leis an ranníocaíocht dheireannach a rinne tú
These credits help protect your future entitlement to social welfare benefits and pensions
Cinnteoidh na creidmheasanna seo nach gcaillfidh tú teidlíocht do shochar leasa shóisialaigh ná do phinsin amach anseo
You can claim an increase for a child if they are under age 18, normally live with you and are maintained by you
Féadfaidh tú méadú a éileamh i leith linbh atá faoi bhun 18, atá ina c(h)ónaí leat de ghnáth más tusa a bhíonn á c(h)othú
If a child is in full-time education by day at a recognised school or college this increase is payable until the end of the academic year in which the the child reaches age 22
Má tá leanbh ag fáil oideachais lánaimsire lae i scoil nó i gcoláiste aitheanta tá an méadú seo iníoctha go deireadh na bliana acadúla sin ina shroicheann an leanbh aois a 22
(This child does not have to live at home)
(Ní gá don leanbh a bheith ag cur faoi nó fúithi sa bhaile
A full-rate Increase for a Qualified Child (IQC) is payable if you are single, widowed, separated or a civil partner who is not living with the other civil partner

Tá an méadú i leith leanaí cleithiúnacha iníoctha is cuma má bhíonn tú singil, i do bhaintreach , scartha ó do chéile nó más páirtnéir sibhialta tú nach bhfuil ina c(h)ónaí leis an páirtnéir sibhialta eile
You may get a half-rate IQC if you are living with your spouse, civil partner or cohabitant
Tá leath den mhéadú i leith Leanaí Cleithiúnacha iníoctha má tá tú ag maireachtáil le do chéile/páirtnéir sibhialta/comhchónaitheoir
If your spouse, civil partner or cohabitant is getting a payment from the Department of Social Protection, you will each get a half-rate increase
Má tá íocaíocht á fháil ag do chéile/páirtnéir sibhialta/comhchónaitheoir ón Roinn Coimirce Sóisialaí, gheobhaidh an bheirt agaibh araon leath den Mhéadú i leith Leanaí Cleithiúnacha
You cannot claim a half-rate IQC with your Carer's Benefit if your spouse, civil partner or cohabitant has an income of over €400 a week

Ó 5 Iúil 2012, más ioncam do chéile, páirtnéir sibhialta ó comhchónaitheoir níos mó ná €400 in aghaidh na seachtaine, ní féidir leat an méadú i leith leanaí cleithiúnacha iníoctha le do Shochar Cúramóra a éileamh a thuilleadh
Carer's Benefit is a taxable source of income and should be advised to your local tax office
Is foinse ioncaim incháinithe é seo agus ba chóir duit é sin a chur in iúl do d'oifig chanach áitiúil
Continuing the payment after a death
Leanúint ar aghaidh le híocaíocht tar éis báis
If the person you are caring for dies, payment of Carer's Benefit will continue for 6 weeks following the death
Má tharlaíonn sé go bhfaigheann an duine a bhfuil tú ag tabhairt cúram dó nó di bás íocfar an Sochar Cúramóra duit go ceann 6 seachtain i ndiaidh a b(h)ás
Carer's Benefit rates from 16 March 2017
Rátaí ó 16 Márta 2017

You are not entitled to the Household Benefits package and Free Travel under the Carer’s Benefit Scheme
Ní hann d’aon teidlíocht ar Phacáiste na Sochar don Líon Tí ná do Shaorthaisteal faoi Scéim an tSochair Chúramóra
To apply fill in an application form for Carer's Benefit (pdf)
Is féidir cóip den fhoirm a bhaineann le Sochar Cúramaí a íoschóipeáil agus a chomhlánú i bhfoirm ag an suíomh (pdf)
This form (CARB1) is also available from your local Intreo Centre or Social Welfare Branch Office or from the Carer's Benefit Section, (see 'Where to apply' below)
Tá an fhoirm seo (CARB1) ar fáil freisin ón Ionad Intreo nó Oifig Bhrainse Leasa Shóisialaigh nó ón Rannóg Shochair Chúramaí, (breathnaigh thíos faoin mír cén áit le hiarratas a dhéanamh)
The Department of Social Protection recommends that you apply for Carer’s Benefit 10 weeks before you leave employment
Molann an Roinn Coimirce Sóisialaí go ndéanfaidh tú iarratas ar Shochar Cúramóra 10 seachtaine sula mbeidh tú ag fágáil do phost
Parts 1, 2, 3 ,5, 6, 7 and 8 should be completed by you
Ba cheart duit codanna 1, 2, 3 ,5, 6, 7 agus 8 a chomhlánú
Part 4 should be completed, signed and stamped by your employer
Ba cheart do do fhostóir cuid a 4 a chomhlánú, a shíniú agus a stampáil
Part 10 should be completed by the person(s) receiving care from you and his/her doctor should complete, sign and stamp the Medical Report
Ba cheart don duine (na daoine) atá faoi do chúram cuid a 10 a chomhlánú agus ba cheart dá d(h)ochtúir an Tuairisc Leighis a chomhlánú, a shíniú agus a stampáil
If you are applying for Carer's Benefit for a second person you should use the application form CARB2 (pdf)
Tá cearta dleathúla tábhachtacha ag Cúramaithe faoi dhlí na hÉireann

Carers have important legal rights. If you think your rights as a carer have been breached, you can make a complaint under the Carer’s Leave Act 2001, using the online complaint form (available by selecting ‘Make a complaint in relation to employment rights’ on workplacerelations.ie). Where to apply
Má cheapann tú go bhfuil do chuid cearta cúramaí sáraithe, is féidir gearán a dhéanamh leis an gCoimisiún um Chaidreamh Oibreachais faoin Acht um Shaoire Chúramaí, 2001 (pdf)
